entry.source: 〉 A woman wearing the uniform of the{F801}Ring of Gaea stands here...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 A woman wearing the uniform of the{F801}Ring of Gaea stands here...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ring of Gaea member\0{F87A,54}{F813,0,707000}So, you are the Hunter who has{F801}accepted my request? You have my{F801}thanks.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707001}Hm? Just a moment...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707002}Hah... I remember you from the{F801}Astaroth incident.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707003}We have crossed paths before.{F801}Do you recall?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Ring of Gaea member\0{F87A,54}{F813,0,707000}So, you are the Hunter who has{F801}accepted my request? You have my{F801}thanks.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707001}Hm? Just a moment...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707002}Hah... I remember you from the{F801}Astaroth incident.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707003}We have crossed paths before.{F801}Do you recall?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ring of Gaea member\0{F87A,54}{F813,0,707004}Well, it is of little importance.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707005}My name is Minako, a former member of{F801}the Ring of Gaea.{F801}{F802}{F812}Minako\0{F87A,54}{F813,0,707006}I have heard the rumors about you.{F801}If I recall correctly, you are{F801}{F843,0}.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707007}Not only have you defeated Astaroth,{F801}but you have been going around slaying{F801}powerful demons. You must be skilled.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707008}I could not have asked for a better{F801}person to come to my aid.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707009}Let me explain my plans, then.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707010}What I strive for is the incarnation{F801}of the goddess Ishtar.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707011}In order to do so, I am trying to{F801}collect the spirits of demons that{F801}stem from Ishtar's being.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707012}You see, Ishtar no longer exists in{F801}this world.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707013}So, we must recreate her from the{F801}demons that originate from her.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707014}Now, Astaroth's soul reacted in both{F801}the {F804,5}northwest{F804,0} and {F804,5}southeast{F804,0} sides of{F801}Tokyo.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707015}There should be demons with the same{F801}origin as Astaroth in those areas.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707016}I want you to assist me in defeating{F801}these demons, in order to make Tokyo a{F801}land of rich harvest.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707017}I wish you the best of luck.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Ring of Gaea member\0{F87A,54}{F813,0,707004}Well, it is of little importance.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707005}My name is Minako, a former member of{F801}the Ring of Gaea.{F801}{F802}{F812}Minako\0{F87A,54}{F813,0,707006}I have heard the rumors about you.{F801}If I recall correctly, you are{F801}{F843,0}.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707007}Not only have you defeated Astaroth,{F801}but you have been going around slaying{F801}powerful demons. You must be skilled.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707008}I could not have asked for a better{F801}person to come to my aid.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707009}Let me explain my plans, then.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707010}What I strive for is the incarnation{F801}of the goddess Ishtar.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707011}In order to do so, I am trying to{F801}collect the spirits of demons that{F801}stem from Ishtar's being.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707012}You see, Ishtar no longer exists in{F801}this world.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707013}So, we must recreate her from the{F801}demons that originate from her.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707014}Now, Astaroth's soul reacted in both{F801}the {F804,5}northwest{F804,0} and {F804,5}southeast{F804,0} sides of{F801}Tokyo.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707015}There should be demons with the same{F801}origin as Astaroth in those areas.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707016}I want you to assist me in defeating{F801}these demons, in order to make Tokyo a{F801}land of rich harvest.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707017}I wish you the best of luck.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Minako\0{F87A,54}{F813,0,707014}Now, Astaroth's soul reacted in both{F801}the {F804,5}northwest{F804,0} and {F804,5}southeast{F804,0} sides of{F801}Tokyo.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707015}There should be demons with the same{F801}origin as Astaroth in those areas.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707017}I wish you the best of luck.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Minako\0{F87A,54}{F813,0,707014}Now, Astaroth's soul reacted in both{F801}the {F804,5}northwest{F804,0} and {F804,5}southeast{F804,0} sides of{F801}Tokyo.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707015}There should be demons with the same{F801}origin as Astaroth in those areas.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707017}I wish you the best of luck.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Minako has appeared...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Minako has appeared...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Minako\0{F87A,54}{F813,0,707018}Impressive. Not even an Overlord is a{F801}match for you.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707019}Now I will take the soul of the great{F801}harlot.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Minako\0{F87A,54}{F813,0,707018}Impressive. Not even an Overlord is a{F801}match for you.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707019}Now I will take the soul of the great{F801}harlot.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 A glowing mass rises from the{F801}body...{F801}{F802}〉 Minako grabs it, then quickly{F801}places it in her mouth and swallows.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 A glowing mass rises from the{F801}body...{F801}{F802}〉 Minako grabs it, then quickly{F801}places it in her mouth and swallows.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Minako\0{F87A,54}{F813,0,707020}......{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707021}Good. Now I want you to slay the other{F801}demon.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707022}I will be heading southeast as soon{F801}as my body acclimates.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Minako\0{F87A,54}{F813,0,707023}What power.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707024}That demon was one of the most ancient{F801}gods. It was no ordinary opponent.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707025}I will take this soul of the Lady of{F801}the Sea.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Minako\0{F87A,54}{F813,0,707023}What power.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707024}That demon was one of the most ancient{F801}gods. It was no ordinary opponent.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707025}I will take this soul of the Lady of{F801}the Sea.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Minako\0{F87A,54}{F813,0,707029}You have done well, {F843,0}.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707030}You have gathered many powerful souls.{F801}We should definitely be able to{F801}cause Ishtar to materialize now.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707031}Now all that is left...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Minako\0{F87A,54}{F813,0,707029}You have done well, {F843,0}.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707030}You have gathered many powerful souls.{F801}We should definitely be able to{F801}cause Ishtar to materialize now.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707031}Now all that is left...{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Minako takes a red pill from her{F801}pocket...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Minako takes a red pill from her{F801}pocket...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Minako\0{F87A,54}{F813,0,707032}The truth, young man, is that I was once{F801}part of a team analyzing the "red pills"{F801}the demons consume.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707033}It is widely know that if a human{F801}ingests one of these pills, she will{F801}turn into a demon.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707034}If you already have some connection{F801}with a demon's power at the time you{F801}take a red pill...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707035}...then you are more likely to turn{F801}into a demon that is closely related{F801}to it.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707036}That's right. This is how I am going{F801}to bring Ishtar into this world.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707037}I will use my body as a vessel.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Minako\0{F87A,54}{F813,0,707032}The truth, young man, is that I was once{F801}part of a team analyzing the "red pills"{F801}the demons consume.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707033}It is widely know that if a human{F801}ingests one of these pills, she will{F801}turn into a demon.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707034}If you already have some connection{F801}with a demon's power at the time you{F801}take a red pill...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707035}...then you are more likely to turn{F801}into a demon that is closely related{F801}to it.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707036}That's right. This is how I am going{F801}to bring Ishtar into this world.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707037}I will use my body as a vessel.{F801}

entry.source: "You will become a demon?"{F801}"What about you?"{F801}"Don't do this!"{F801}
entry.target: "You will become a demon?"{F801}"What about you?"{F801}"Don't do this!"{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Minako\0{F87A,54}{F813,0,707038}Do not concern yourself with me.{F801}I have thought of gaining a demon's{F801}body for quite some time.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707039}Even if the demon takes over my{F801}consciousness, I will become Ishtar.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Minako\0{F87A,54}{F813,0,707038}Do not concern yourself with me.{F801}I have thought of gaining a demon's{F801}body for quite some time.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707039}Even if the demon takes over my{F801}consciousness, I will become Ishtar.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Minako\0{F87A,54}{F813,0,707040}Hahaha... Well, yes, I suppose there{F801}is one problem.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707041}If I become a demon in this way, it is{F801}likely that the demon's mind will take{F801}priority over mine.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707042}But, I have already made up my mind.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707043}Even if the demon takes over my{F801}consciousness, I will become Ishtar.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Minako\0{F87A,54}{F813,0,707040}Hahaha... Well, yes, I suppose there{F801}is one problem.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707041}If I become a demon in this way, it is{F801}likely that the demon's mind will take{F801}priority over mine.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707042}But, I have already made up my mind.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707043}Even if the demon takes over my{F801}consciousness, I will become Ishtar.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Minako\0{F87A,54}{F813,0,707044}Hahaha... Are you worried for me?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707045}Rightly so. There is one problem with{F801}this method.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707046}The demon's mind overrides that of the{F801}human, effectively removing that{F801}person's personality.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707047}But I have already made up my mind.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707048}Even if the demon takes over my{F801}consciousness, I will become Ishtar.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Minako\0{F87A,54}{F813,0,707044}Hahaha... Are you worried for me?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707045}Rightly so. There is one problem with{F801}this method.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707046}The demon's mind overrides that of the{F801}human, effectively removing that{F801}person's personality.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707047}But I have already made up my mind.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707048}Even if the demon takes over my{F801}consciousness, I will become Ishtar.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Minako quickly swallows the red{F801}pill...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Minako quickly swallows the red{F801}pill...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ishtar\0{F87A,-36}{F813,0,707051}I am the ancient goddess Ishtar.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707052}I have come to fulfill my contract{F801}with Minako, and make this a fecund{F801}and bountiful land.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707053}{F843,0}, I thank you for your aid{F801}in Minako's quest.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707054}She sacrificed her body and soul in{F801}order that her prayers might reach me.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707055}I shall keep my side of our promise,{F801}for that is what a goddess should do.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707056}And, I shall tell you that the last{F801}of Minako's mind resides within me.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707057}Now it is my turn to aid you.{F801}Would you please let me go with you?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Ishtar\0{F87A,-36}{F813,0,707051}I am the ancient goddess Ishtar.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707052}I have come to fulfill my contract{F801}with Minako, and make this a fecund{F801}and bountiful land.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707053}{F843,0}, I thank you for your aid{F801}in Minako's quest.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707054}She sacrificed her body and soul in{F801}order that her prayers might reach me.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707055}I shall keep my side of our promise,{F801}for that is what a goddess should do.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707056}And, I shall tell you that the last{F801}of Minako's mind resides within me.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707057}Now it is my turn to aid you.{F801}Would you please let me go with you?{F801}

entry.source: "It would be an honor."{F801}"I cannot allow that."{F801}
entry.target: "It would be an honor."{F801}"I cannot allow that."{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ishtar\0{F87A,-36}{F813,0,707058}I understand.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707059}Please call for me if you ever need{F801}my strength.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707060}I shall call to the land, helping this{F801}barren Tokyo become a more fertile{F801}and productive place.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Ishtar\0{F87A,-36}{F813,0,707058}I understand.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707059}Please call for me if you ever need{F801}my strength.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707060}I shall call to the land, helping this{F801}barren Tokyo become a more fertile{F801}and productive place.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Ishtar disappears...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Ishtar disappears...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ishtar\0{F87A,-36}Very well, then.{F801}{F802}Let me introduce myself...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Ishtar\0{F87A,-36}Very well, then.{F801}{F802}Let me introduce myself...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ishtar\0{F87A,-36}{F813,0,707061}I am the goddess Ishtar. It will be{F801}my pleasure to go with you.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Ishtar\0{F87A,-36}{F813,0,707061}I am the goddess Ishtar. It will be{F801}my pleasure to go with you.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Ishtar has joined the party...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Ishtar has joined the party...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ishtar\0{F87A,-36}{F813,0,707062}But... You already have many demons{F801}with you. It would seem that there is{F801}no room for me.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707063}Very well. I shall wait for you in{F801}that tower.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707064}Please talk to me when your{F801}preparations for me are finished.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Ishtar\0{F87A,-36}{F813,0,707062}But... You already have many demons{F801}with you. It would seem that there is{F801}no room for me.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707063}Very well. I shall wait for you in{F801}that tower.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707064}Please talk to me when your{F801}preparations for me are finished.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ishtar\0{F87A,-36}{F813,1,491003}Are you ready for me to join you?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Ishtar\0{F87A,-36}{F813,1,491003}Are you ready for me to join you?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ishtar\0{F87A,-36}Hmm. It would appear that you still do{F801}not have room for me to join you.{F801}{F802}Very well. I shall remain here for{F801}you.{F801}{F802}Please come back when you are ready{F801}for me to join you.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Ishtar\0{F87A,-36}Hmm. It would appear that you still do{F801}not have room for me to join you.{F801}{F802}Very well. I shall remain here for{F801}you.{F801}{F802}Please come back when you are ready{F801}for me to join you.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ishtar\0{F87A,-36}{F813,0,707065}But... It seems as though a fraction of{F801}my spirit is already with you.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707066}I shall let this fraction continue to{F801}work for you. I shall take my leave.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Ishtar\0{F87A,-36}{F813,0,707065}But... It seems as though a fraction of{F801}my spirit is already with you.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,707066}I shall let this fraction continue to{F801}work for you. I shall take my leave.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ishtar\0{F87A,-36}But... It seems as though a fraction of{F801}my spirit is already with you.{F801}{F802}I shall let this fraction continue to{F801}work for you. I shall take my leave.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Ishtar\0{F87A,-36}But... It seems as though a fraction of{F801}my spirit is already with you.{F801}{F802}I shall let this fraction continue to{F801}work for you. I shall take my leave.{F801}
